title: thunderbird sous android
creator: didier.lebaron
content: Bonjour, Sous mon mobile android version 14,j'ai le dossier nomm√© trash et sur mon pc il s'appelle corbeille. Du coup quand je vide la corbeille sur mon pc, le dossier trash ne se vide pas sur mon mobile android. Comment modifier les noms des dossiers trash outbox et draft. Cordialement
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Send to Group of Contacts
creator: iceguy
content:
Thunderbird Desktop has many features that K9 does not. For example sending email to groups of contacts or filtering incoming messages to folders.

Is there a plan to give Thunderbird for Android some of those features?
